title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Long-Sleeve Waffle Shirt
description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
LIGHTWEIGHT WAFFLE THERMAL: A super soft cotton blend, knit in a waffle texture.
EVERYDAY T SHIRT: Perfect on its own or layered, this t-shirt is a versatile, year-round closet staple.
DETAILS: Ribbed trim at neckline and sleeve cuffs, three button center front placket, and back neck half moon detailing.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
